categories: Category:Star Wars: The New Jedi Order

nodes.text: The New Jedi Order: Dark Tide II: Ruin (audiobook)

The New Jedi Order: Dark Tide II: Ruin is the abridged audio version of the Star Wars Legends novel of the same name, written by Michael A. Stackpole. Dark Tide II: Ruin, part of the Dark Tide Duology, is the third volume in The New Jedi Order novel series. The audiobook was performed by Anthony Heald, with abridgment by Sharon Mattlin, and was first released on cassette tape on June 6, 2000. A downloadable edition was released on February 20, 2007.
